name: Game & Watch Gallery 2 (itch)
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.0 (beta) Details Title Game & Watch Gallery 2 Series Game Boy Color Model No. DMG-AGLE Manufacturer Nintendo Release Date November 20, 1998 Chipset Sharp LR35902 ( 4.2 MHz ) Description

Game & Watch Gallery 2 is a collection of five classic Game & Watch LCD titles from Nintendo remade for the Game Boy Color handheld console.

Gameplay

You can play each of the five Game & Watch titles included in this collection based on the gameplay of the original LCD handhelds (Classic mode) or in an updated version (Modern mode) with new graphics, colors, sound effects and all your favorite Nintendo characters.

  • Parachute
    It's a desperate situation! Paratroopers are dropping into an ocean filled with man-eating sharks.
    Maneuver your boat to catch the parachutists before they fall into the sea.
     
  • Helmet
    Holy Henny-Penny, it's raining tools! Move quickly and don't let any hit you in the head.
     
  • Chef
    Flip up a feast, but don't drop any food. That would just be a waste!
     
  • Vermin
    Move quickly and accurately to stop moles as they tunnel your way.
     
  • Donkey Kong
    Donkey Kong has kidnapped a girl and it's up to Mario to rescue her.
     
Controls Keyboard Up W or Up Arrow Down S or Down Arrow Left A or Left Arrow Right D or Right Arrow Select Space Start Enter Button A X or CTRL Button B Z or SHIFT Mouse Rotate Drag Press Left-click Zoom Mousewheel
